About Me: Innovator, Designer, and Entrepreneur

I am a multi-disciplinary innovator with a unique blend of product design, management, and engineering experience. I specialize in taking ideas from 0 to 1, driving product-market fit, and launching impactful products.

With experience spanning AAA Games, Apps, AR/XR, and AI, I have launched over 12 successful hardware and software products. I‚Äôve led startup ventures, collaborated with large teams, and forged partnerships with Microsoft, the Royal National Institute for the Blind, and gaming studios like Secret Exit.

I hold a BA in 3D Animation and Film, an MA in Innovation Design Engineering from the Royal College of Art, and an MS from Imperial College London. My work has been featured in CNET, WIRED, Ophthalmology Times, and the Queen Elizabeth Prize for Engineering for its impact on tech and innovation.
